mobile_app_desc: Create a mobile app incredibly fast, without coding. Learn how to drag and drop UI (user interface) elements into an app, integrate your app with backend data, and secure your app with an authentication mechanism.
mobile_app_1_desc: Open a native mobile app and preview it on your mobile device.
mobile_app_1_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

    Import a sample native app that shows lists of Accounts and Recipients 

    Preview the sample app on a mobile device
mobile_app_2_desc: Create the user interface for an app with Volt MX Iris
mobile_app_2_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Create forms with UI elements for user interaction
  • Add navigation to access the different forms in this app
mobile_app_3_desc: Secure an app’s data with a user-authentication mechanism.
mobile_app_3_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Learn to configure an Identity Service
  • Map the Identity Service to the UI elements of an app
mobile_app_4_title: Creating Services for the Back-end Data
mobile_app_4_desc: Create services for the back-end data
mobile_app_4_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Create and configure Storage Object Services Accounts and Recipients.
  • Publish the Project Services to a run-time server.
mobile_app_5_desc: Connect App UI to the data.
mobile_app_5_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Connect services with the Account form
  • Connect services with the Recipients form
mobile_app_6_title: Creating Details Screen and Delete Recipients
mobile_app_6_desc: Creating Details Screen and Add Delete Recipients
mobile_app_6_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Create a Recipient details form
  • Create the UI for the Recipient Details form using services
  • Add the feature for deleting the recipients
mobile_app_7_desc: Add the capability to create a new recipient.
mobile_app_7_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to:

  • Create and Design a form for creating a recipient
  • Connect the services to create recipient with the UI elements
mobile_app_8_desc: Add the capability to edit the details of a recipient.
mobile_app_8_detail:
This learning module is a Volt MX HIKE.  A HIKE is an interactive tour inside Volt MX Iris that guides you through step-by-step process of each module. You can access the HIKES catalog by clicking the Hike icon in the Iris toolbar: 

  

Learn how to: 

  • Generate a screen for editing recipient details
  • Design the UI for the Edit Recipient form
  • Connect the data from service to the UI elements
mobile_app_9_desc: Use the Volt MX App to preview the Recipients app on a mobile device.
